summary: A famous female flier and a member of Parliament drift into a potentially disastrous affair.
cast: Katharine Hepburn|Colin Clive|Billie Burke|Helen Chandler|Ralph Forbes|Irene Browne|Jack La Rue|Desmond Roberts|Agostino Borgato|Sherry Hall|Tiny Jones|Margaret Lindsay|Gwendolyn Logan|Miki Morita|Paul Ralli|Zena Savine|Pat Somerset|Donald Stuart
title: Hacia las alturas
